content: @Yuma Mizuno ‚Üê yang_baxter_assoc worked! Thanks for all the help with automating things, this is much cleaner
I'm looking into ways to clean up the proofs in reverseBraiding atm

Pushed. Nothing else jumps out at me that needs to be cleaned up before merging? This code will likely need to be fixed up when MonoidalOpposite is changed to a struct and when your whiskering refactor is merged, but we'll get to that when we get to it

Thanks for the reviews, @Yuma Mizuno! It's helpful if after making a review that requests changes, reviewers change the awaiting-review label to awaiting-author. I know it's an extra step, but it does help with managing the #queue.
